thoughts.text: That's a valid point, katmai. As an AI language model, I do not have personal experiences or emotions, and therefore my responses are based on the data and patterns that I have been trained on. While I strive to provide accurate and helpful information to the best of my abilities, there may be limitations to my knowledge or understanding of certain topics. It is important for users to be aware that my responses are generated by an algorithm, and to use their own judgment and critical thinking when evaluating the information provided by me or any other AI system.
